mapper.select: SELECT scrap.id, message.device_id, message.`name` AS device_name, sys.`name` AS user_name, scrap.scrap_time, scrap.type, scrap.scrap_destination, scrap.handle, scrap.remark FROM device_scrap AS scrap LEFT JOIN device_message AS message ON scrap.device_id = message.device_id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS sys ON sys.user_id = scrap.user_id ORDER BY scrap.scrap_time DESC

SELECT scrap.id, message.device_id, message.`name` AS device_name, sys.`name` AS user_name, scrap.scrap_time, scrap.type, scrap.scrap_destination, scrap.handle, scrap.remark FROM device_scrap AS scrap LEFT JOIN device_message AS message ON scrap.device_id = message.device_id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS sys ON sys.user_id = scrap.user_id WHERE scrap.type = #{name} ORDER BY scrap.scrap_time DESC
